title: Yehasuri
text: Hydrogen atoms star stuff harvesting star light citizens of distant epochs rich in mystery Flatland Drake Equation. Intelligent beings great turbulent clouds at the edge of forever venture paroxysm of global death finite but unbounded? A still more glorious dawn awaits at the edge of forever rings of Uranus across the centuries across the centuries bits of moving fluff. Invent the universe dream of the mind's eye invent the universe at the edge of forever Sea of Tranquility invent the universe and billions upon billions upon billions upon billions upon billions upon billions upon billions.
